activities: The majority of personal information received is employee specific and is used solely to administer necessary corporate functions related to employees (payroll, benefits, HR, etc.).  Boart Longyear does not supply this data to 3rd parties other than consultants (such as tax advisors or benefit plan administrators) that have a direct need for the information in order to provide necessary services to the company and/or the employees.  These consultants are all subject to confidentiality obligations to Boart Longyear.  Boart Longyear also obtains company specific information from customers purchasing products or services. This information is used for the purpose of supplying the requested services and products to the customer.  Boart Longyear does not provide or sell its customer data to 3rd parties.
